Red.en: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

Blue.en: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

Yellow.en: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

Gold.en: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.

Silver.en: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.

Crystal.en: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.

Ruby.en: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

Sapphire.en: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

Emerald.en: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.

FireRed.en: This Pokémon is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own.

LeafGreen.en: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.

Diamond.en: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

Pearl.en: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

Platinum.en: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
